body:
Comment 6 by **jacobsa@google.com**: 
Russ, you are being seriously passive aggressive. I've written you multiple
paragraphs explaining what I think the issue is and why it caused me as a user
of the language a slight problem, and all you've given is sass, not bothering
to write a full sentence of content. If you think my report is silly, could
you please at least explain why?
